Title: The Apartment
Plot: Kramer tries mousse in his hair. Jerry gets Elaine an opportunity to get the apartment right above him, before he realizes the possible implications. George tests the "man with a wedding band" theory of meeting women.
GuestStars: David Blackwood, Tony Plana, Glenn Shadix, Jeanine Jackson, Leslie Neale, Theresa Randle, Patricia Ayame Thomson, Melody Ryane
